title: MNE-BIDS: An MNE project for organizing and formatting MEG and EEG data according to the BIDS specification.
description: MNE-BIDS is a Python library to facilitate the analysis of MEG and EEG with MNE-Python for data conforming to the BIDS (Brain Imaging Data Structure) format. More information about BIDS and MNE can be found under bids.neuroimaging.io and mne.tools respectively.

creators.affiliation: Center for Adaptive Rationality, Max Planck Institute for Human Development, Berlin, Germany
creators.name: Appelhoff, Stefan
